name: Firefox anti Australis
description: Changes tab appearance to rectangular (Win8 style), moves tab bar to the bottom of the menu and hides the menu button.
additional_info: I highly recomend to activate the title bar or the menu bar, else the window buttons overlab the navigation bar! Compatible with my other style Firefox with Windows 8 / Windows 10 colors. Versions: 0.1.6 Updated for Firefox 48; Fixing recommendation pop-up position 0.1.5 Updated for Firefox 42 on Windows 10; Compatibility mode for other script not needed anymore 0.1.4 Compatibility with style "Firefox with Windows 8 colors" can now be selected from dropdown menu on userstyles.org 0.1.3 Minor cosmetic fix: Use right margin to overlap tab borders instead of left margin so the left border is still visible on the first tab 0.1.2 Updated to move the bookmark bar below the address bar 0.1.1 Updated to remove the menu button and small fix 0.1.0 First release Also available on GitHub
